name: 3rd Super Robot Wars Z Jigoku Henfor
name_original: 3rd Super Robot Wars Z Jigoku Henfor
description:
3rd Super Robot Wars Z Jigoku Henfor is an action game developed by Banpresto. It came out on 10-04-2014. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
You can play 3rd Super Robot Wars Z Jigoku Henfor on PlayStation 3.
